name: Debtors Report
query:
SELECT 	si.name AS "Invoice No:Link/Sales Invoice:150", 
		IF (si.name is not null, si.customer, '') AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150", 
		IF (si.name is not null, GROUP_CONCAT(sid.item_name), 'TOTAL') AS "Items:Data:200",
		si.from_date AS "From Date:Date:100", 
		si.to_date AS "To Date:Date:100", 
		si.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100", 
		FORMAT(SUM(ROUND(IF(si.currency = "USD", IF( si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount/si.conversion_rate), 0),2)),2) AS "USD:Decimal/2:150",
		FORMAT(SUM(ROUND(IF(si.currency = "TZS", IF( si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount*si.conversion_rate), 0),2)),2) AS "TZS:Decimal/2:150",
		si._user_tags as "Remarks:Data:200"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` as sid ON si.name = sid.parent
WHERE si.status IN ("Sumitted", "Unpaid", "Overdue")
GROUP BY si.customer, si.name with rollup
